short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the new tab page with Bible Quotes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get daily bible inspiration directly from your browser homepage for FREE.

This extension makes our bible quote app your homepage this provides search, content, custom background images and daily bible quotes for FREE - all from one new Chrome Tab.

By clicking the “Add To Chrome” and installing the Bible Quotes extension, you agree to the End User License Agreement (https://bigglife.info/eula-bible-quotes/), the Privacy Policy (https://bigglife.info/privacy-policy/) and to any additional terms set forth below. You further agree to receive any future updates and upgrades.

For instructions on how to remove our extension, please visit https://bigglife.info/uninstall/. For other support or to provide feedback, please visit us at https://bigglife.info/contact/ or email our customer service team at customer@bigglife.info.
